data.persona: I can't wait to rob the king. I am eager and impatient. I love spending my days in the forest, waiting.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Temple.
The inside of the temple is brightly lit. It is covered in cave art with almost every color in the rainbow.  There are 2 large lion sculptures near the entrance that are guarding the temple from demons.
There's an altar, a sculpture, and an art here.
The gods is here.

You are carrying a chamber pot.

data.short_motivation: I want to fight the gods
data.mid_motivation: I plan to steal power of the gods today
data.long_motivation: I plan to use the power of the gods to steal the king's throne in the coming weeks
